Best tactical shooter, too bad it fucking sucks if you don't have a 5 man team to play with. Solo Q is literally the worst experience ever, and 90% of it is fucking luck on whether your teammates are good or are not complete fucking assholes (literally 90% of the community are assholes). I am not lying when I say this is BY FAR the worst community and the most toxic, stay away for your own health.
